journey.title: Expanse Launch
journey.description: Founded with a mission to provide transparent, high-performance hosting solutions.

journey.title: Game Server Expansion
journey.description: Launched our game server platform with instant deployment and custom control panel.

journey.title: Global Infrastructure
journey.description: Expanded to 4 regions worldwide with state-of-the-art data centers and 1Gbps networks.

journey.title: Ryzen 9000 Series
journey.description: One of the first hosting provider to deploy AMD Ryzen 9950X processors across our entire infrastructure.

journey.title: AI-Enhanced Platform
journey.description: Introduced AI-powered automation tools for server management and performance optimization.

differentiators.title: Ryzen 9950X Deployments
differentiators.description: Industry-leading performance with the latest AMD processors, delivering exceptional single and multi-threaded performance.

differentiators.title: Global Data Centers
differentiators.description: Strategic locations worldwide ensure low-latency connections and optimal performance for users across different regions.

differentiators.title: Ceph Storage Architecture
differentiators.description: Distributed storage system providing unmatched reliability, performance, and scalability for all your data needs.

differentiators.title: Enterprise Security
differentiators.description: Advanced DDoS protection with up to 200+ Tbps mitigation capacity, keeping your services online 24/7.
